sent.orig: A messy kitchen is a happy kitchen, and this kitchen is delirious.
sent.trans: 如果杂乱的厨房是令人愉悦的，那这个厨房简直就是让人兴奋至极了。

sent.orig: Special Items Kitchen Furniture, furniture, carpets, curtains, kitchen appliances, other home appliances.
sent.trans: 特殊项目厨房装修，装潢，地毯，窗帘，厨房设备，其他家庭设备。

sent.orig: Kitchen furniture. Safety requirements and test methods for built-in and standing kitchen cabinets and work tops.
sent.trans: 厨房家具。内装和外放厨柜和工作台的安全技术要求和检验方法。

sent.orig: He made kitchen utensils and appliances jingle in the kitchen.
sent.trans: 他在厨房把厨具弄得丁零当啷地响。

sent.orig: There are many kitchen design trends that you can use in your kitchen cabinet refacing project.
sent.trans: 如果你有一个厨房，可能一开始的小房间似乎是非常困难时，你想设计自己的厨房，您的个人偏好。
